nodesData.title: Glen Dimplex - Supplier Emails
nodesData.description:
[Technical PoC (August)](https://phantm.notion.site/Artefacts-from-Captr-Proof-of-Concept-0f341d4ecda047cebedbc6c9fb7c3467?pvs=4) captured emails going back and forth between Phantm and Glen Dimplex when requesting packaging information. 

Let's plug these into the Captr Supplier Dashboard. It will help us see what we're really dealing with, and it *might* be helpful for sales efforts on Glen Dimplex.

nodesData.title: Scenario Planning
nodesData.description: 'What if' Analysis

nodesData.title: Report: Industry Benchmarks
nodesData.description: Compare performance with industry peers

nodesData.title: Structured Data Requests
nodesData.description:
Excel templates provided to Suppliers

Data automatically extracted when received by Phantm

nodesData.title: Email integration and file upload for supplier specifications
nodesData.description:
*Frictionless specification capture through familiar business tools, making it easy for suppliers to provide packaging information through email or simple file uploads.*

* Unique supplier email addresses
* Store communications and attached files
* File upload interface
* Inbox / Activity Log
* Document storage
* Basic document management (view, delete, assign to SKU)

*Enable seamless capture of supplier communications and documents through multiple channels while maintaining organisation and traceability.*

* Unique supplier project address
* Email parsing and routing
* Document storage
* Basic metadata
* Version control

nodesData.title: Bulk Upload Tools for Suppliers
nodesData.description: Mass document processing

nodesData.title: Advanced Data Integrations
nodesData.description:
* Datalake extraction tools
* iPaaS connectors (Zapier etc)
* Custom integration patterns, e.g. integrating directly with customer's bespoke setup

nodesData.title: API Development
nodesData.description:
* end-point for Inbound data (e.g. to support customers who collect data at Purchase Order)
* Two-way API, for selected scenarios
* Authentication/security

nodesData.title: ERP Integrations
nodesData.description:
* Batch synchronisation engine
* Direct integration to selected ERP systems
* Handling data changes

nodesData.title: Import data with CSV Template
nodesData.description:
* Template for product, sales, packaging data (individually or all together)
* Import data to customer database by file upload
* Basic validation

nodesData.title: Customer Moderation of Best Guess Data
nodesData.description:
Enable customer to adjust generated data. 
Part of a data reconciliation and quality control workflow.

nodesData.title: Custom Data Schema Support
nodesData.description:
*Enterprise-ready data flexibility allowing customers to extend Captr's core data model with their own fields and tags, while maintaining platform integrity and scalability.*

### **General Direction**

*Balance customer flexibility with platform scalability through controlled customisation capabilities, leveraging our medallion architecture and flexible schema approach.*

* Schema extension mechanisms
* Custom field validation rules
* Field visibility controls
* Data migration tooling
* Performance monitoring

nodesData.title: Multipart Data Import and Reconciliation
nodesData.description:
Case 1:

Import Sales Data Only 
**THEN** Import Product Data Only 
**REQUIRES** Data Reconciliation to join Product and Sales Data Together

Case 2: 

Import Sales Data Only **OR** Product Data Only
**THEN** Import Packaging Data
**REQUIRES** Data Reconciliation to join Packaging Data Together

nodesData.title: Data quality improvement tracking
nodesData.description: Visualise improvement over time. Gamify.

nodesData.title: Extract Data from Specification Docs
nodesData.description:
Programatically Interpret Spec Documents provided by suppliers

Pre-populate data model and correlate with products (where possible)

First step before approval/reconciliation process to manage quality and fill in the gaps

nodesData.title: Supplier Task Management (productivity)
nodesData.description:
Document Comments, Task Creation, Assign Tasks.
Enable team to coordinate data acquisition with sources and suppliers in an organised way.

nodesData.title: Supplier Catalog Digitisation
nodesData.description:
Codify a suppliers entire range of packaging products.
Make this information available to brands who consume those products. 

e.g. Norwood -> Bunnings

nodesData.title: Supplier Performance Dashboard
nodesData.description: Analysis and scoring of packaging materials associated with that supplier

nodesData.title: Data Transformation and Migration Utilities
nodesData.description:
Tools and utilities for processing raw data as part of customer migration. Some are bespoke, others are reusable. 

* Advanced mapping scripts
* Bulk processing scripts
* Validation rules and test automation
* Custom transformations

Not sure what we can do with Norwood yet. 
We have logins to some of their internal tools, and there's a fortnightly sync with Adam that should be set up soon.

nodesData.title: Visual Indicators of data quality
nodesData.description: Make it clear when data is 'estimated' and to what degree it can be relied upon

nodesData.title: Analytics configuration
nodesData.description:

Google Analytics, Posthog, etc

nodesData.title: Monitoring configuration
nodesData.description:
How are we going to monitor issues in the frontend?

Sentry, Datadog, Graphana, etc.

nodesData.title: Compare and improve (tuning)
nodesData.description:
Run tests to measure accuracy of estimates against known data.
Create a mechanism to do this systematically on going (e.g. as we get real data, use it to check quality of previous estimations)

nodesData.title: Data Intelligence Co-pilot
nodesData.description:
Continuous analysis and actionable recommendations based on AI-powered packaging portfolio patterns.

## General Approach

*Create an intelligent system that identifies opportunities and risks, providing actionable insights through pattern recognition and rules-based analysis.*

* Pattern detection
* Recommendation engine
* Measuring improvement from action
* Continuous improvement
* Value prioritisation

Use Case Mapping
nodesData.description:
What level of data quality is recommended for different use cases for the data
e.g. Identifying an area for further investigation vs. APCO report vs. LCA

nodesData.title: Data Scoring Rubric
nodesData.description:
What are the key factors for determining a score?

What levels are there?

What does it look like to get from Level 1 to Level 3?

nodesData.title: Expert moderation of Best Guess results
nodesData.description:
Solutions Team eyeball it, and normalise the results. 
Adjust prompts to 'train' the model.

nodesData.title: Progressive Data Enhancement
nodesData.description:
Flexible menu of data improvement methods allowing teams to incrementally enhance their packaging data through a combination of automated tools, benchmarks, and collaborative options.

## General Direction

* Automated enhancement tools
* Rule-based pattern detection
* Micro-questions for continuous data enrichment
* Targeted data interventions to maximise customer value
* External reference data
* Category matching algorithms
* Reference data (e.g. customers like youâ€¦)
* Validation frameworks
* 'Human in the loop' mechanisms

```markdown
Add Sub-tasks as they become clear
```

nodesData.title: Emma Lewisham
nodesData.description:
Data includes Product and Packing Specs.
Manually transform to target data model and migrate to Captr.

nodesData.title: Phantm Portfolio Report
nodesData.description:
Instant access to professional-grade packaging analysis that typically requires expensive consulting, powered by customer's own data on-file.

## General Direction

*Focus on automated generation of comprehensive analysis, with clear communication of data confidence levels and insights validity.*

* Simple Reports
* Data confidence integration
* Automated calculations

nodesData.title: Supplier Relationship Manager (Lite)
nodesData.description:
*Central hub for supplier communications and specification management, making packaging information accessible to all team members without complex process changes.*

### **Overall Considerations and General Direction**

*Focus on simplifying information capture and access, with minimal disruption to established workflows of supplier and retailer.*

* Contact information management
* Document organisation and search
* Activity tracking/Inbox
* Assign supplier documents to products (without automated processing of data)

nodesData.title: User Authentication with username and password
'White glove' data migration services
nodesData.description:
Customer provides their data in whatever format they have it, 
Phantm team transforms it to correct structure, and works alongside customer to migrate it to Captre

nodesData.title: Generate packaging data with Public LLMs using real Sales/Product Data
Deployment configuration
nodesData.description: How are we going to deploy the frontend to different environments? Setup Github workflows to push main to production.

nodesData.title: Material Library - Basic
nodesData.description:
### **Customer Value**

Central command centre for packaging materials data, enabling teams to explore, analyse, and manage their complete packaging portfolio through a single, intuitive interface.

### **General Direction**

*Focus on intuitive data exploration and management, emphasising critical data and clear visual indicators to help business users find the right information and understand it*

* Simple add/edit (e.g. one item at a time)
* Component-based material breakdown
* Integrated supplier documentation
* Search and filter optimisation
* Data quality indicators
* Bulk data management tools

nodesData.title: Agree on frontend framework
nodesData.description:
What are we going to write the frontend using?

React, Vue, etc

nodesData.title: Buildpack setup
nodesData.description:
What are we going to use to package up the frontend?

Vite, Webpack, etc
